title: Observant
content:
Observant (Not in Game) Effect Increase your Intelligence or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20. You have a +5 bonus to your passive Wisdom (Perception) and passive Intelligence (Investigation) scores. Requirements All Classes at Level 4
